hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "I saw (in a dream) a black woman with unkempt hair going out of Medina and settling at Mahai'a, i.e., Al-Juhfa. I interpreted that as a symbol of epidemic of Medina being transferred to that place (Al-Juhfa)

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا رَأَى أَنَّهُ أَخْرَجَ الشَّىْءَ مِنْ كُورَةٍ فَأَسْكَنَهُ مَوْضِعًا آخَرَ
chapter.eng-name: If one sees in a dream that he takes something and places it at another place
